sentences.english: It's now expecting fiscal-year results at the lower end of expectations.
sentences.chinese: 目前預計本財年公司收益將處在預測區間的低端。

sentences.english: The UAE was India's biggest trading partner in the 2012-13 fiscal.
sentences.chinese: 13財年度，阿聯酋是印度最大的貿易伙伴。

sentences.english: The firm also increased its earnings forecast for the current financial year.
sentences.chinese: 寶馬公司同時提高了2010財年的收益預期。

sentences.english: Thee mega-retailer didn't have a whole lot to complain about in fiscal 2010.
sentences.chinese: 2010財年，這家超級零售商可抱怨的地方不多。

sentences.english: These orders can pile up at the end of the fiscal year.
sentences.chinese: 這些舉措可以堆積在本個財年末來完成。
